q_en: What sewing tasks will Elite Sewers be assigned before June 30, 2024?

steps.sql: SELECT st.* FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id WHERE c.customer_name = 'Elite Sewers' AND wg.name = 'before June 30, 2024';
steps.description: To find out what sewing tasks the customer 'Elite Sewers' will be assigned before June 30, 2024, we need to retrieve the sewing tasks that match the specified criteria.

response:
Certainly! Let me provide you with the answer to your question:

| Sewing Task ID | Task Description | Deadline     |
|----------------|------------------|--------------|
| No results found. | - | - |

It seems that currently, there are no sewing tasks assigned to 'Elite Sewers' before June 30, 2024. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! ğŸ˜„
